name: Game Face - Put yourself in the game
name_original: Game Face - Put yourself in the game
description:
Game Face
Put yourself in the game

Welcome to the world of Game Face!

The game in simple but challenging, you have to tap the bubble to avoid the pipes and collect the starfish cold coins,

What makes our game so different is you can take a photo of yourself or a friend and put them in the game!

Connect to Game Centre to compete with your friends.

Any suggestions comments please email us or tweet us

http://SlinkyApps.com

http://twitter.com/slinkyapps
